summary: This bill, the Lower Colorado River Multi-Species Conservation Program Amendment Act of 2025, amends the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009 to establish an interest-bearing account in the Treasury for non-Federal contributions to the Lower Colorado River Multi-Species Conservation Program. This fund will hold unexpended and future non-Federal contributions, earning interest through investment in U.S. obligations.  The Secretary of the Treasury will manage the Fund, depositing contributions and making funds available for program expenditures per existing agreements.
